cs.LG, cs.NE, cs.CV, cs.CL, cs.AI. 

The paper discusses methods used in deep learning, which is a subfield of machine learning and artificial intelligence. The paper specifically mentions applications in machine translation, computer vision, and speech recognition, which are all subfields of AI. Therefore, cs.AI is a likely sub-category. The paper also mentions optimization methods, which are commonly used in neural networks, making cs.NE another likely sub-category. The paper discusses techniques for reducing the size of the tape when performing reverse-mode AD, which is relevant to automatic differentiation, making cs.LG a likely sub-category. The paper also mentions computer vision and speech recognition, which are subfields of AI and have their own sub-categories, cs.CV and cs.CL, respectively.
